attributes.action: Make all feminine menstruation products, such as sanitary pads, free of charge.
attributes.additional_details: As women, we would feel more at ease if products for menstruation were made free as it would allow us to be less embarrassed with purchasing them, and also make us feel more relaxed as instead of worrying about saving money to buy these necessary means, we would be able to continue our activities. When purchasing menstruation products such as Tampons and sanitary towels, women feel embarrassed and find it awkward, however if these were free, it would allow them to be open and easy about it.
attributes.background: Menstruation is a natural process which causes pain, discomfort and often nuisance to millions of women. Menstruation can decrease confidence and often leads to women stopping hobbies and activities they love as they are embarrassed, and purchasing products for menstruation is inconvenient.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105172

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
